txt.en: Glóin has sent you a letter requesting your presence at Annâk-khurfu in Elderslade.
As Prince Durin contemplates the course of the Gabil'akkâ, Glóin, father of Gimli and hero of the Lonely Mountain, has sent a letter requesting your aid at Annâk-khurfu in Elderslade.
As Prince Durin contemplates the course of the Gabil'akkâ, Glóin, father of Gimli and hero of the Lonely Mountain, has sent a letter requesting your aid at Annâk-khurfu in Elderslade.
Glóin wishes to meet you in the war-room at Annâk-khurfu
